Description: Funerary papyrus of [..]-mont containing Book of Traversing Eternity (short version); row of black line vignettes with stars above; Hieratic text below.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: F.R. Herbin, Le Livre de parcourir l'eternite, OLA 58 (1994), pp.28-29, pl.XXXII. Herbin, F.-R., Books of Breathing and Related Texts (Catalogue of the Books of the Dead and Other Related Texts in the British Museum IV), London, 2008, pp. 158-159, pls. 147-149.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (280)
Herbin 2008 / Books of Breathing and Related Texts (pp.158-159, pls.147-149)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57912) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57912)
